head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MICHAELS, LILLIAN (NEE GOLDMAN)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MICHAELS, LILLIAN (NEE GOLDMAN)

block.p: MICHAELS--Lillian (nee Goldman). On April 27, 2007, at the age of 81. Beloved wife of Julius, of Port St. Lucie, FL, formerly of Greenlawn, NY; loving mother of Harvey and Amy Michaels, of Wayland, MA, Janet and Gary Knapp of Gaithersburg, MD, David and Nancy Michaels, of Scarsdale, NY, and Dr. Daniel Michaels and Suzannah Coles of Delmar, CA; proud grandmother of Laura, Andrew, Jeremy, Joshua, Debra, B.J., Emily, Kiote and Sage; dear sister of Florence and Morton Merewitz, and the late Matthew and Sherle Goldman. Funeral services Monday, April 30, 2007, 11am at ''Westchester Reform Temple'', 255 Mamaroneck Road, Scarsdale, NY. Interment will follow at Wellwood Cemetery, Farmingdale, NY.

Funeral services Monday, April 30, 2007, 11am at ''Westchester Reform Temple'', 255 Mamaroneck Road, Scarsdale, NY. Interment will follow at Wellwood Cemetery, Farmingdale, NY.
